General.Name: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co.,LTD provides products and services for urban rail transit systems in China. It provides urban rail transit systems comprising embedded medium-low speed maglev, modern tram, suspended monorail, and the imbedded and continuously supported track systems, as well as metro transports; and transportation functional components, including bridge supports, expansion joints, bridge inspection vehicle, pre-stressed anchorage devices, bridge dampers, and disaster reduction and prevention products. Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co.,LTD was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

2.Name: Mr. Yang  Zhang
2.Title: Director, Board Sec. & Deputy Gen. Mang.
